alert.note: Alert for Van Buren (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 15 at 3:59PM EST until January 16 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST TUESDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Advisory, wind chills as low as 20 below zero. For the Winter Weather Advisory, lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches. * WHERE...Van Buren county. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 1 PM EST Tuesday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 10 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the evening commute. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
